entities.value: Sunny: Features a hot, cloudless sky with an occasional light breeze.
Sunny with cloudy periods: A warm day with a light breeze.
Overcast: A warm day with cloud cover and an occasional light breeze.
Light Precipitation: Roll again for light precipitation. (WIP, eventually tool will handle reroll for you.)
Medium Precipitation: Roll again for medium precipitation. (WIP, eventually tool will handle reroll for you.)
Heavy Precipitation: Roll again for heavy precipitation. (WIP, eventually tool will handle reroll for you.)
